content: This tender patty is made in-house and seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheddar cheese, pineapple, jalapeño, chili pepper, turkey bacon, caramelized onions, bacon jam and a secret sauce.
desc: This tender patty is made in-house and seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheddar cheese, pineapple, jalapeño, chili pepper, turkey bacon, caramelized onions, bacon jam and a secret sauce.
name: TT's Signature Chicken Burger
title: TT's Signature Chicken Burger
